Reviews.Title: Nice camera and case
Reviews.Author: pamela Springer
Reviews.Content: I really like this little bundle. The camera itself is a very easy to use little camera that produces pretty good pictures. The bundle also comes with a very soft Taylor Swift carrying case that is really handy and fashionable. It also comes with a memory card. A perfect bundle set. Makes a great gift.

Reviews.Title: I really hate it.
Reviews.Author: yuhui qu
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new one for amzon one month ago. I got a used one and really disgusting. I connected to the seller and asked for the refunded. They agreed. I mailed back immediately and they also received it. But now it near 3 weeks, I got nothing. I don't who I should mad at. I need my refund ASAP.

Reviews.Title: Great for amateurs
Reviews.Author: P. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I am not a photographer.  I take photos for our online business and photos of our family, but by no sense of the word am I a photographer.  I do not know or understand much beyond the basics of point, focus and shoot.  My husband is even more ignorant than I am.  With that said, this camera takes terrific photos with minimal fuss and very nice results.For you all out there who just want to take a photo of a scene, your loved one or a flower, this camera should do you just fine.  The Amazon bundle of accessories makes this a complete photo set up for enthusiastic  amateurs.When my husband can take clear sharp photos with a digital camera without a lot of fussing and cussing, it has to be a good camera.  Richard Avedon he is not!

ProductInfo.Features:
Cyber-shot® W690 with LE Taylor Swift case and 8GB SD Card.
Capture more breathtaking shots with Sweep PanoramaTM mode. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle
In 720p MP4 movie mode the camera shoots 1280 x 720 high definition movies at 30 fps
Includes Battery, Battery Charger, Manual, Wrist strap, Multi-USB Cable, 8GB SD Card and Carrying Case
16.1 MP with 10x Optical Zoom, 3 inch LCD
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSCW690 Taylor Swift Camera Bundle 16.1MP and 10X Optical Zoom
